name: Hand-Breaded Chicken Tenders
description: Everything's better when it's handmade, including our 100% all white meat chicken tenders. Made right, every time and served with your choice of signature sauces.

name: Cod Sliders
description: A golden-fried cod filet, tartar sauce, and dill pickles on a soft potato bun.

name: Made Fresh Root Beer
description: Our signature item since the opening of our first tiny Root Beer stand in 1919. It's still made fresh on site with real cane sugar and a proprietary blend of herbs, bark, spices and berries. This frosty mug deserves a celebration.

name: Papa Burger
description: Two juicy 100% U.S. Beef patties with two slices of melted American cheese. Finished off with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles and our classic A&W Papa Sauce all on a lightly toasted bunâ€¦ it doesn't get better than this.
